messages.content: What is the primary function of ComfyUI CustomScheduler?
ComfyUI CustomScheduler is a simple node for setting the sigma values directly, which is used for a better denoise process.
What is the significance of the last sigma value in the image generation process?
For a full denoise in image generation, the last sigma value should be zero.
What do the screenshots provided in the documentation demonstrate?
The screenshots demonstrate the interface and functionality of the CustomScheduler node within the ComfyUI.
Which repository did BlakeOne refer to in the creation of the ComfyUI CustomScheduler?
BlakeOne based ComfyUI-CustomScheduler on code from [ComfyUI_tinyterraNodes](https://github.com/TinyTerra/ComfyUI_tinyterraNodes).
What other scheduler node has BlakeOne created?
BlakeOne has also created another scheduler node called ComfyUI-SchedulerMixer, which allows users to create a custom scheduler from a weighted average of the built-in schedulers.
Can you describe briefly how ComfyUI-SchedulerMixer works?

ComfyUI-SchedulerMixer works by allowing users to create a custom scheduler by blending different built-in schedulers using weighted averages, giving more flexibility and finer control over the generation process.
